FAIL_TO_PASS: when specify excess program argument and allowExcessArguments(false) then error
when specify excess command argument and allowExcessArguments(false) then error
when specify excess after <arg> and allowExcessArguments(false) then error
when specify excess argument then throw CommanderError
when too many command-arguments then shows help
when specify command with excess argument then throw CommanderError
when specify excess program argument and allowExcessArguments(true) then no error
when default subcommand and unrecognised argument then call default
when default subcommand and no command then call default
when specify excess after [arg] and allowExcessArguments(false) then error
when default subcommand and unrecognised option then call default
when specify excess program argument and allowExcessArguments() then no error
